site.name: Anshal Chopra
site.tagline: Data Scientist · Data Engineer · Analytics Engineer

about.html:
End-to-end Data Scientist and Pipeline Developer driven by the complexities of financial systems. I am obsessed with extracting predictive signals from equity markets and payment ledgers using rigorous NLP and time-series forecasting.

I own the entire stack: from engineering the robust ETL pipelines that ingest the data, to utilizing advanced ML for prediction, to deploying the final models into production. I build the infrastructure, train the math, and ship the code.

contact.description: Open to full-time roles, freelance projects, and research collaborations in data science, analytics engineering, and financial AI systems.
